"Dumbbells? They're just another excuse for you to avoid the real workout - the one that's in your head!"
"Dumbbells? You're relying on physical strength instead of mental fortitude. I'll show you what's truly powerful!"
"Dumbbells? They're a distraction from the real challenge - pushing yourself to achieve more than you ever thought possible."
